de.java2html.gui
Class GBorderedPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              de.java2html.gui.GBorderedPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GBorderedPanel
extends java.awt.Panel

A Panel subclass that draws a border around itself and arranges its components safely inside its border. For questions, suggestions, bug-reports, enhancement-requests etc. I may be contacted at: markus@jave.de The Java2html home page is located at: http://www.java2html.de

Version:

insets

public java.awt.Insets insets()
Deprecated. 

Overrides Container's Insets methods to return non-zero values. Leaves extra space if the panel has a label.
